text: “For example, Moses said to the fathers:Some 4% of the Greek manuscripts omit “to the fathers” (as in NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc.). ‘The Lord ourInstead of ‘our’, perhaps 40% of the Greek manuscripts read ‘your’. God will raise up for you a Prophet, like me, from among your brothers. You must listen to Him, in all that He may say to you.
